ComicInfo.Summary: Untitled: Out from under Cobra control, the Transformers split into their respective teams and begin to go after their own agendas. Fearing the government is going to nuke Cobra Island, the Joes disobey orders and head to the snake pit so that the world won't end in a blast of nuclear energy and energon.
ComicInfo.Title: Untitled
